description: This file defines a React component named TaskList that renders a list of tasks with options to edit, delete, and toggle completion status. It sorts tasks by completion status and creation date, and displays a message when no tasks are available.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks, onEdit, onDelete, onToggle })
methods.description: React component that renders a sorted list of tasks with interactive controls.

ctags.name: TaskList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TaskList({ tasks, onEdit, onDelete, onToggle }) {$/
